sentences.en: It is difficult to determine basic assessable variable of the indexes in model analysis.
sentences.cn: 结合防空兵作战能力评估模型,运用“云重心”理论确定了评估模型中各指标基本评定值.

sentences.en: Results Of the 693 segments of arteria, 683 were assessable on both DSA and CTA.
sentences.cn: 结果在693个动脉节段中, 683个节段在CTA与DSA均可以显示.

sentences.en: Tax payment is limited to a maximum of the standard total assessable income before allowances.
sentences.cn: 应缴税款将不超过以标准税率计算扣除免税额前之总收入.

words.tran_cn: 财产价值已被估定之人
